title: Microsoft to ship Nvidia chips to United Arab Emirates; invest $15.2 billion
description: Microsoft announced Monday that it has export licenses to ship Nvidia chips to the United Arab Emirates to help boost its artificial intelligence goals.
content:
Nov. 3 (UPI) -- Microsoft announced Monday that it has export licenses to ship Nvidia chips to the United Arab Emirates to help boost its artificial intelligence goals.

title: Palantir forecasts fourth-quarter revenue above estimates on solid AI demand
description: Palantir Technologies forecast fourth-quarter revenue above analysts' estimates on Monday, as the rapid adoption of artificial intelligence boosts demand for its data analytics services from businesses and governments.
content:
Shares of the company gained about 2% in extended trading.

title: Palantir Reports Record Quarterly Revenue, Hikes Forecasts
description: Palantir Technologies Inc. raised its annual revenue outlook to $4.4 billion and outpaced analyst estimates for third-quarter sales, citing “accelerating and otherworldly” growth for its artificial intelligence and data analytics products.
content:

title: Artificial Intelligence Deals Fuel Market Gains Amid Economic Uncertainty
description: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq saw gains driven by AI-related deals despite unclear monetary policy and scarce economic data. Amazon's collaboration with OpenAI and Nvidia's restricted chip exports contributed to the rally. Meanwhile, conflicting Fed views and a significant acquisition by Kimberly-Clark stirred investor attention.
content: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite climbed higher on Monday, led by artificial intelligence deals, particularly Amazon's collaboration with OpenAI on AWS cloud services. As the Federal Reserve's monetary policy remains uncertain, technology companies w... [600 chars]

title: Microsoft $9.7 billion deal with IREN will give it access to Nvidia chips
description: Microsoft has entered into a $9.7 billion cloud services contract with artificial intelligence cloud service provider IREN that will give it access to some of Nvidia's chips. The five-year deal, which includes a 20% prepayment, will help Microsoft as it looks to keep up with AI demand. Last week the…
content:

title: Lake County porn case highlights dark side of new technology
description: Sara Avalos, of the Lake County State’s Attorney’s Office, said there’s “growing concern” surrounding the use of artificial intelligence-generated imagery depicting the sexual abuse of children.
content: The case of Ricardo Russell, a former Deerfield High School janitor described in court documents as a dealer of child pornography, highlights the dark side of a new technology and a rising concern for the Lake County State’s Attorney’s Office — artif... [5634 chars]
